item.name: category_already_exists
item.message: There is already a category with the same name for the selected module

item.name: category_in_use
item.message: Not all marked categories have been deleted, because they are used by at least one resultset.

item.name: description_to_short
item.message: The description should be at least 3 characters long

item.name: invalid_image_filesize_entered
item.message: Please type in the maximum image filesize in bytes

item.name: invalid_image_height_entered
item.message: Please type in the maximum image height in pixels

item.name: invalid_image_selected
item.message: Either you selected an image with a invalid filesize, or the image is to wide, to tall or the filsize is to big

item.name: invalid_image_width_entered
item.message: Please type in the maximum image width in pixels

item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module you can create categories for other modules.

item.name: name_to_short
item.message: The name of the category should be at least 3 characters long
